All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The Starting point of the game
BaseTeam
The base class for teams, stores the basic behaviour, and stores all the objects required for the team
BSExceptions
Customs exceptions used for the application.
BSExceptions.ContestantNotFound
Throws if the contestant has not been found
BSExceptions.InvalidObjectAttributeType
Throws if the attribute type is not valid for the member
BSExceptions.InvalidTeamSize
Throws if the team size is invalid
BSExceptions.ItemNotFound
Throws if an item has not been found in a list
BSExceptions.ObjectModifierNotFound
Throws if the object modifier has not been found
ClubScreen
The Class ClubScreen.
ComputerTeam
Creates a new computer team for the matches.
Contestant
Constuctors for the contestant as well as generating the funds value for the contestant.
ContestantAttribute
Attributes for the Contestant, and a method to generate random values
ContestantModifer
Modifiers for the Contestant, and a method to generate random values
ContestantOld
 
ContestantPosition
 
GameEnviroment
Controls the flow of the game, and stores important varibables, such as the Random Object, the difficulty of the game, and the PlayerTeam
InventoryScreen
The Class InventoryScreen.
Item
Stores Items.
ItemStoreScreen
The Class ItemStoreScreen.
MainMenuScreen
The Class MainMenuScreen.
Market
Generates and stores Items, Sleds, and Contestants which can be sold to the Player Controls the behaviour necssary for the player to interact with the market.
PlayerSetupScreen
The Class PlayerSetupScreen.
PlayerStoreScreen
The Class PlayerStoreScreen.
PlayerTeam
This class provides the behaviour necessary for the player to control their team.
PostWeekScreen
 
Ram
 
SetupScreen
The Class SetupScreen.
Sled
Provides the constructors for sleds.
SledAttribute
Stores sled attributes, and a method to generate random values.
SledModifier
Modifiers for the Sled, and a method to generate random values
SledStoreScreen
The Class SledStoreScreen.
Stadium
This class controls the matches avalible to the player, as well as the behaviour of the matches themselves.
StadiumScreen
The Class StadiumScreen.
StoreScreen
The Class StoreScreen.
TeamBehaviour
A redundant interface, which could be used in the future to develop persistent computer teams.
TeamMember<A extends Enum<A>,M extends Enum<M>>
Provides the basic functionality for all team members (Sleds and Contestants).
Utils
General methods used throughout the application
